![](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?i=2pUdXqwZMkdolED9Lth8%252BHXI3Q2xLlzoW26pdevg1MPXH8OI9JjuIDp5M0IcWLF1&s=xlarge)
Fiscal Transparency
Fiscal Transparency

**[2026 Fiscal Year Proposed Budget](https://caldwelltx.sharepoint.com/:x:/s/Leadership/Ec3c5bH0RWxPjfFJm3PyU8MBwEz-e3YsY6s1iNZdGMmygQ?e=16hK6v)**

**[2025-2026 FY Master Fee Schedule for the City of Caldwell](https://caldwelltx.sharepoint.com/:b:/g/EfxjEsITLv5Lny1XXqp2AHcBxnk5L8Qlm25xGwi1VoLpxA?e=T63wzR)**

* The City Council adopted a Master Fee Schedule for the upcoming fiscal year on September 16, 2025. All fees and rate changes will be effective October 1, 2025. Fees shown in red have changed from the prior year.

* **2025 Fiscal Year Proposed Budget for the City of Caldwell**
  + The 2025 Fiscal Year (FY) runs from 10.01.2024 – 09.30.2025 and was adopted by the Council on Tuesday, August 20, 2024.
* **The 2024-25 Proposed Property Tax Rate for the City of Caldwell**
* **2024-2025 FY Master Fee Schedule for the City of Caldwell**
  + The City Council adopted a Master Fee Schedule for the upcoming fiscal year on September 17, 2024. All fees and rate changes will be effective October 1, 2024. Fees shown in red have changed from the prior year. The fee schedule was amended on October 15, 2024 for minor changes to sewer commercial rates and solicitor/vendor licenses.

* **2024 Fiscal Year Adopted Budget for the City of Caldwell**
  + The 2024 Fiscal Year (FY) runs from 10.01.2023 – 09.30.2024 was adopted by the Council on August 15, 2023.
* **2023-2024 FY Master Fee Schedule for the City of Caldwell**
  + The City Council adopted a Master Fee Schedule for the upcoming fiscal year on September 20, 2022. All fees and rate changes will be effective October 1, 2023.
    - [2023-2024 Fee Schedule](https://caldwelltx.sharepoint.com/:b:/g/IQDeiMs2PrxtTLA9ZVNstO2oAUjKXkXsvnsdK1FkXmSejVc?e=7evD0U)

* **2023 Fiscal Year Adopted Budget for the City of Caldwell**
  + The 2023 Fiscal Year (FY) runs from 10.01.2022 – 09.30.2023 and was adopted by the Council on August 16, 2022.
* **2022-2023 FY Master Fee Schedule for the City of Caldwell**
  + The City Council adopted a Master Fee Schedule for the upcoming fiscal year on September 20, 2022. All fees and rate changes will be effective October 1, 2022.
    - [*View 2022-2023 Master Fee Schedule.*](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/CaldwellTX_FEE-SCHEDULE-2022-2023_Final.pdf)
* **2023 Proposed Property Tax Rate for the City of Caldwell**

* **2022 Adopted Property Tax Rate for the City of Caldwell**
  + A tax rate of $0.37957 per $100 valuation has been adopted by the governing body of the City of Caldwell on August 16, 2022. For the maintenance and support of the General Government (General Fund), $.20822 per $100 valuation of property and for the Interest and Sinking Fund, $.17135 per $100 has been adopted by the governing body of the City of Caldwell.
* **2022 Fiscal Year Adopted Budget for the City of Caldwell**
  + The 2022 Fiscal Year (FY) runs from 10.01.2021 – 09.30.2022 and was adopted by the Council on August 17, 2021.

* + *View the Annual Financial Audit Report for fiscal year end September 30, 2021*
* **2021 Fiscal Year Adopted Budget for the City of Caldwell**
  + The 2021 Fiscal Year (FY) runs from 10.01.2020 – 09.30.2021 and was adopted by the Council on September 17, 2020.
* **2021 Adopted Property Tax Rate for the City of Caldwell**
  + A tax rate of $0.37957 per $100 valuation has been adopted by the governing body of City of Caldwell.
* + [*View 2021 Hot Funds Report.*](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/sb1221-online-CALDWELL-TX_FY2021.pdf)

* **2020 Annual Financial Audit Report**
  + The City Budget was originally February 1 - January 31. In 2020 City Council voted to switch to a October 1 - September 30 fiscal year to align with other municipalities and grant opportunities. Therefore in 2020 the Annual Financial Audit Report was split into a long year and short year, please see the two reports below.
    - *View the Annual Financial Audit Report for fiscal year end January 31, 2020*
    - *View the Annual Financial Audit Report for fiscal year end September 30, 2020*
* **2020 Fiscal Year Adopted Budget for the City of Caldwell**
  + The 2020 Fiscal Year (FY) runs from 01.01.2020 – 09.30.2020.
* **2020 Adopted Property Tax Rate for the City of Caldwell**
  + A tax rate of $0.37957 per $100 valuation has been adopted by the governing body of City of Caldwell.
* **2020 HOT Funds Report**

Remove your Passkey

Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
